fields.name: user
fields.description: User Role: User of the research activity.

fields.name: reviewer
fields.description: Reviewer Role: Conducting peer review, evaluation, and validation of the research activity.

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: Contributor Role: Contributing to the research activity.

fields.name: designer
fields.description: Project or Experiment designer Role: Designing and planning the research activity.

fields.name: manager
fields.description: Manager Role

fields.name: advisor
fields.description: Advisor Role

fields.name: conceptualiser
fields.description: Conceptualiser Role: Ideas; formulation or evolution of overarching research goals and aims.

fields.name: methodology-developer
fields.description: Methodology developer or designer Role: Development or design of methodology; creation of models.

fields.name: software-developer
fields.description: Software developer Role: Programming, software development; designing computer programs; implementation of the computer code and supporting algorithms; testing of the software.

fields.name: validator
fields.description: Validator Role: Verification, whether as a part of the activity or separate, of the overall replication/reproducibility of results/experiments and other research outputs.

fields.name: data-analyst
fields.description: Data analyst Role: Responsible for the data analysis, processing, and data curation.

fields.name: investigator
fields.description: Investigator Role: Conducting a research and investigation process, specifically performing the experiments, or data/evidence collection.

fields.name: project-administrator
fields.description: Project administrator Role: Management and coordination responsibility for the research activity planning and execution.

fields.name: funding-acquisition
fields.description: Funding acquisition Role: Acquisition of the financial support for the project leading to this publication.

fields.name: resources-provider
fields.description: Resources Provider Role: Provision of study materials, reagents, materials, patients, laboratory samples, animals, instrumentation, computing resources, or other analysis tools.

fields.name: supervisor
fields.description: Supervisor Role: Oversight and leadership responsibility for the research activity planning and execution, including mentorship external to the core team.

fields.name: writer-original-draft
fields.description: Writer - Original Draft Role: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically writing the initial draft (including substantive translation).

fields.name: writing-reviewer-editor
fields.description: Writing - Reviewer & Editor Role: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work by those from the original research group, specifically critical review, commentary or revision – including pre- or post-publication stages.

fields.name: writing-reviewer
fields.description: Writing - Reviewer Role: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work by those from the original research group, specifically critical review, commentary or revision – including pre- or post-publication stages.

fields.name: student
fields.description: Student Role: Student in the research activity.
